svg.title: ST-12: Comprehensive Risk Assessment Matrix Visualization
svg.desc: Advanced interactive risk assessment matrix showing intersection of failure probability and impact severity with AI-specific risk categories, dynamic risk calculations, mitigation strategies, and confidence engineering for Strategic Testing in LLM-generated code scenarios.
svg.text: Comprehensive risk evaluation with AI-specific categories, dynamic calculations, and confidence engineering
Probability × Impact with dynamic risk calculations
LLM-generated code testing with Strategic Testing confidence engineering
• Repository context gaps leading to incompatible code
• Business logic misunderstanding and rule violations
• Integration context failures and dependency issues
• Edge case blind spots in AI-generated logic
• State transition errors in complex workflows
• Data validation gaps and error handling
• Memory leaks and resource management issues
• Input sanitization gaps in generated code
• API contract violations breaking existing interfaces
• Dependency version conflicts with incompatible libraries
• Poor error handling for external service dependencies
Real-time risk assessment with AI enhancement factors
Base Risk: High Probability (4) × Catastrophic Impact (5) = 20
Confidence Level: 48% | Testing Priority: Critical | Resource Allocation: 35%
Risk-based testing prioritization with confidence engineering approach
Color-coded zones with mobile accessibility and screen reader support
Green - Safe zone, minimal testing needed
• Quick risk assessment mode for rapid evaluation
• WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with matrix navigation
• Screen reader support with risk announcements
🔗 Strategic Testing Integration: ST-001 → ST-004 → ST-010 → ST-012 Template Library
♿ WCAG 2.1 AA | Matrix Navigation Support | Risk Level Announcements | Touch-Optimized Interface
🔄 Advanced Risk Assessment: 5×5 matrix | 12 hours complexity | Real-time calculations | AI-specific categories | Confidence engineering focus
